resources.string: If disabled, then no hardware acceleration will be used when decoding the video.
If enabled, all logging will go to the sagetv-miniclient.txt log file on the root of the SD CARD
(%s) - If not using LiveTV, you can set this to Pull, so that seeking will work.
If using Send Log, then make sure that you are NOT logging to file. Logging to a File will result in Send Log only capturing a partial log.
Automatically connect to the last connected server on start up
(%s) - The number of seconds to wait before auto connecting to the last server.
If enabled then remote key presses that are not mapped will be show as a message in the UI when they happen
If true, then when the app pauses, it will fully terminate the application and close all connections
When enabled, it may increase rendering performance on a WIRED connection. Never enable for WIFI or Placeshifter.
Disabling this may increase performance for WIRED connections, but should never be enabled for WIFI connections
Disabling this will decrease rendering performance, but may reduce the screen flicker
If enabled, then long pressing the SELECT button will bring up the built-in Navigation. Otherwise, it should bring up the SageTV Options.
If enabled, then ExoPlayer will be used for video playback
Some players cannot access SageTV streams and require an http proxy.
Failed to play the selected media file
If enabled, then the Select will be Pause/Play if the Video UI is visible
